name: Cooking Chef- Fun Cooking Game
description:
It is time to give that cooking dream a chance. Start your cooking career as a trainee chef. You will be in for humble beginnings in terms of being a cooking chef but the dream to make it as a big cook will help you carry on in your cooking journey. Move up the ladder from trainee chef to Commis chef, Chef de Partie, Sous chef and finally the top spot of your cooking journey, to Chef de Cuisine one step at a time. To make a great cooking career out of it, however, you will need to please your restaurant customers and generate enough cash to move on to the next stage and buy sophisticated restaurant equipment.

You are hired in a chain restaurant to serve clients as fast as possible to earn money and even tips for yourself. Take orders from your customers and make a recipe among sandwiches, garnishes, desserts and sodas. The more you will play, the more ingredients will appear in the fast-food !

Travel across the world and spread the Cooking Chef- Fun Cooking Game, something a restaurant could never let you do! Use various ingredients to cook lots of amazing recipes of delicious burgers.

We can’t wait to stand in the long queue of people waiting to be seated at the table in your restaurant. Good Luck!
